heading: Account settings
edit-interests-form-intro: Manage your account details and preferences.
To change other company details or your details contact us at <link>support@example.com</link>.
your-organisation-company-details-sub-he: To update your company information please contact us at <0>support@example.com</0>
invite-form-editor-description: Editor - can manage your company data, supply chain connections and team members
invite-form-viewer-description: Viewer -  can see all the data and connections of your company but won’t be able to manage them
your-organisation-company-sectors-sub-he: Sector information will be shared with your supply chain connections, and will allow you to filter the emission comparison table
your-organisation-update-company-sectors: We couldn't update the company sector, please try again
your-organisation-company-team-members-s: People that are part of your company account
personal-preferences-contact-us-sub-head: To update your name or email contact us at <0>support@example.com</0>
user-details-form-email-extra: To edit your email please contact our support team
user-details-form-error: We couldn’t update your details, please try again
editor-role-description: Editor (you can add, edit or delete your company and supply chain connections, as well invite new member to join the company account)
viewer-role-description: Viewer (you can see all the data and connections in the platform but won’t be able to add, edit or delete it)
areas-of-interest-description: Select the areas that you wish to explore to lower your company carbon footprint. This will help us to identified, relevant cost-efficient low-carbon solutions, that may support you in achieving your decarbonisation ambition.
areas-of-interest-not-able-to-sucessfull: We couldn’t update your areas interest, please try again
remove-user-description: By removing <bold>{{ userName }}</bold>, they won’t be able to access the Hub anymore. Are you sure you want remove them?
remove-user-warning: This action and cannot be undone.
resend-invite-error-toast: We couldn’t send the invitation, please try again
your-organisation-company-privacy-sub-he: Here you can control who can see your historical publicly available data. Learn more about sharing your data in our <0>Help Center</0>
your-organisation-company-privacy-questi: Who can see your historical public available data?
your-organisation-company-privacy-error: We couldn’t update the Privacy & sharing preferences, please try again
